ai-patthana18.25:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma, third in the place he had allowed to,
ai-patthana18.25:1.1_0: for refuge, for the sake of refuge, not for the sake of refuge.
ai-patthana18.25:2.1_0: Because of a reason to give rise to cause no cause or reason.
ai-patthana18.25:2.1_3: What four trivial trees have been uneven.
ai-patthana18.25:3.1_0: or cause a reason for refuge.
ai-patthana18.25:4.1_3: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana18.25:5.1_0: only for the sake of refuge, not for the sake of refuge. ...
ai-patthana18.25:6.1_0: only cause or reasons to give rise to causes and reasons.
ai-patthana18.25:6.1_1: Two on account of the intrustance ...
ai-patthana18.25:6.1_4: What four trivial trees have been uneven.
ai-patthana18.25:7.1_0: only for the sake of refuge, not for the sake of refuge. ...
ai-patthana18.25:8.1_4: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana18.25:9.1_0: On the sake of a teaching associated with refuge, not with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana18.25:9.1_2: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana18.25:10.1_3: What four trivial trees have been uneven.
ai-patthana18.25:10.1_4: like beings on a charnel ground,
ai-patthana18.25:11.1_0: Both causes and reasons not give rise to cause or reason for a reason,
ai-patthana18.25:12.1_0: without cause or reason, without reason,
ai-patthana18.25:12.1_3: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana18.25:13.1_0: Also, for the sake of refuge, or for the sake of refuge, not for the sake of a reason. ...
ai-patthana18.25:14.1_3: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana18.25:15.1_0: Both the cause and reason for a lay follower without cause or reason.
ai-patthana18.25:15.1_1: (Having) causes and conditions to be connected with cause,
ai-patthana18.25:16.1_0: You shouldn’t give rise to a refuge for cause or reason.
ai-patthana18.25:17.1_1: This is the cause of two reasons:
ai-patthana18.25:17.1_2: one person is building up one another while mutually saying:
ai-patthana18.25:17.1_4: What is not the reason for two reasons.
